body: The following traps are available to kobolds. At the GM's discretion, other races can also make use of these traps.
name: Kobold Traps

sections.name: Dragonfire Trap
sections.effect: cone of fire (2d6 fire damage, Reflex DC 20 half); multiple targets (all targets in a 15-ft. cone)

sections.name: Ensnaring Dirt Trap
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Kobolds/New Rules/Kobold Traps/Ensnaring Dirt Trap
sections.effect: ensnaring dirt (target is entangled until the target succeeds at a DC 25 Strength or Escape Artist check); Reflex DC 25 negates

sections.name: Acid drop Trap
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Kobolds/New Rules/Kobold Traps/Acid drop Trap
sections.effect: falling bag of acid (3d6 acid damage, Reflex DC 20 half)

sections.name: Dragon Dung Pit Trap
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Kobolds/New Rules/Kobold Traps/Dragon Dung Pit Trap
sections.effect: 20-ft.-deep pit (2d6 falling damage); dragon dung (Atk +10, creature stinks of dragon dung, -4 on all Stealth checks for 24 hours, -8 on Stealth checks if detecting creature has the scent ability); Reflex DC 20 negates; multiple targets (all targets in a 10-ft.-square area)

sections.name: Falling Log Trap
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Kobolds/New Rules/Kobold Traps/Falling Log Trap
sections.effect: Atk +10 melee (1d6+7); multiple targets (all targets within a 20-foot line)

sections.name: Snake Spear Trap
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Kobolds/New Rules/Kobold Traps/Snake Spear Trap
sections.effect: Atk +15 ranged (1d8+6 plus black adder venom)

sections.name: Rotting Badger Under a Falling Rock Trap
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Kobolds/New Rules/Kobold Traps/Rotting Badger Under a Falling Rock Trap
sections.effect: Atk +10 melee (1d6+6); rotting badger (nauseated for 1d3 rounds, Fort DC 20 negates); multiple targets (all targets within 10 feet must attempt to save against the rotting badger)
